document_data.name: Amdramnar
document_data.mainbody: '''Amdramnar''' was a friendly young [[malaugrym]] in the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History:
In the {{YearlinkName|1358}}, during the hunt for [[Elminster]], Amdramnar welcomed the [[Rangers Three]], who had come through a ''[[gate]]'' to the [[Castle of Shadows]]. Amdramnar hoped to make [[Sharantyr]] his mate one day.

Later, following hints discovered in the writings of the long-dead Shadowmaster High [[Melvydur]], Amdramnar found a secret grotto inside the castle.<ref> However, using a separate way, his rival [[Argast]] also found it. They decided to temporarily cooperate to discover the secret of this place. Afterward, both decided to travel to [[Faerun]].<ref> Upon their arrival they were attacked by some members of the [[Cult of the Dragon]] but thanks to their shapechanging powers, Amdramnar killed all the cultists. After arriving in [[Daggerdale]], Amdramnar and Argast learned about the death of Elminster during the [[second battle of Shadowdale]].<ref>

Later they went in disguise into the [[Tower of Ashaba]] in order to collect more information about Elminster.<ref> Upon the arrival of [[Tantor Dauntinghorn]], envoy of King [[Azoun IV]] of [[Cormyr]], Argast and Amdramnar posed as the [[War Wizard]] delegates [[Luthtor]] of [[Suzail]] and [[Shaerl Amcathra|Shaerl Mourngrym]] in order to gain information.<ref>

Amdramnar was killed by [[Itharr]] and [[Belkram]].<ref>
